name: Quiz Application
backend_requirements: Access control: allow public quiz taking; restrict quiz creation and results history to authenticated users
1. Question model: id, question_text (required), options (JSON array), correct_answer (integer index)
3. POST /api/quiz/submit - accept answers array, return score and correct answers
5. GET /api/quiz/review/:id - return quiz results for review
frontend_requirements: Public guest view for taking quizzes with CTA to sign in for saved results
1. Display one question at a time with radio buttons for options
2. 'Next' button to proceed, 'Submit' on last question
3. Show score after submission with correct/incorrect indicators
4. Review mode showing all questions with correct answers

api_endpoints.description: Submit quiz answers and get score

fields.question: text (required)
fields.correct_answer: string (A-D, not exposed to frontend until submitted)

admin_requirements: 1. Admin overview list with total/active/inactive counts
2. Toggle active status for any question

admin_api_endpoints.description: Admin overview: list all questions and counts
